additionalInformation: Only increases the hero's secondary attributes. The primary attribute is not increased.
For strength heroes, it grants 2.17 armor, 13 attack speed, 156 mana, and 0.65 mana regen.
For agility heroes, it grants 260 health, 1.3 health regen, 156 mana, and 0.65 mana regen.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 260 health, 1.3 health regen, 2.17 armor, and 13 attack speed.
name: Pupil's Gift
description: An astounding plate of ever-replenishing, fortifying fruit.
